actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution electing Representative Wright as Speaker Pro Tempore during the absence of the Speaker until December 22, 1981.

summary.text: Elects the Honorable Jim Wright of Texas as the Speaker pro tempore during the absence of the Speaker of the House until December 22, 1981.

titles.title: A resolution electing Representative Wright as Speaker Pro Tempore during the absence of the Speaker until December 22, 1981.
